title: Person With White Cane Light Skin Tone
description: A person, often depicted as a person, walking with a white cane, indicating visual impairment or blindness. It signifies independence, mobility, and awareness of accessibility.

Their posture is upright, and their expression is serene, conveying a sense of self-assurance through Apple‚Äôs realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading.
